channel.title: Adidas on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Adidas on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar On His Bruce Lee-Inspired Adidas Collab, Taking On More Acting Gigs and His New Graphic Novel
item.description: The NBA legend and activist has re-teamed with the sportswear brand on a capsule collection that pays homage to ‘Game of Death.’
